Name: Allow partial payments
Description: Allow your customer to pay less than the balance due

Name: Allowed payment methods
Description: The payment methods that can be used to pay the invoice.
Options: Credit or Debit Card (credit_or_debit_card); ACH (ach); SEPA (sepa); BACS (bacs); PADS (pads)

Name: Amount billed
Description: The amount billed on the invoice

Name: Amount billed in company currency
Description: The amount billed on the invoice in the company currency

Name: Amount billed (pre-tax)
Description: The amount billed on the invoice before tax

Name: Amount paid
Description: The total value of non-failed payments associated to the invoice.
Usages: Automation platform flow (1); Pipeline object tag (1)

Name: Amount paid in company currency
Description: The total value of non-failed payments associated to the invoice in the company currency

Name: Amount processing
Description: The total value of processing payments associated to the invoice.

Name: Balance due
Description: The balance due for the invoice.

Name: Balance due in company currency
Description: The balance due for the invoice in the company currency

Name: Billing frequency type
Description: Indicates whether or not the invoice is part of a recurring series (a subscription).

Name: Comments
Description: Comments to the Invoice recipient.

Name: Create Date
Description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Currency
Description: The currency of the invoice

Name: Days paid late
Description: How many days the invoice was paid after the due date
Options: Paid on time (paid_on_time) [READ-ONLY]; 1-30 days late (between_1_30_days_late) [READ-ONLY]; 31-60 days late (between_31_60_days_late) [READ-ONLY]; 61-90 days late (between_61_90_days_late) [READ-ONLY]; 90+ days late (over_90_days_late) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Discounts total
Description: The sum of all line item level discounts and invoice level discounts applied to the invoice.

Name: Due date
Description: The due date for the current invoice.
Usages: Automation platform flow (1); Report (4); Data sync mapping (1); Sales view (2); Pipeline object tag (1)

Name: Exchange rate
Description: This is the exchange rate used to convert the invoice amount into your company currency.

Name: Invoice external create date/time
Description: The date and time at which the invoice was created in the 3rd party accounting application

Name: External recipient
Description: The recipient of the current invoice.

Name: Fees total
Description: The sum of all fees applied to the invoice.

Name: Age category
Description: How many days an invoice has been outstanding

Name: Invoice billable
Description: Whether or not the invoice is billable

Name: Invoice date
Description: Date of the Invoice.

Name: Latest company name
Description: The latest name value among companies associated to this invoice

Name: Latest contact email
Description: The latest email value among contacts associated to this invoice

Name: Latest contact first name
Description: The latest first name value among contacts associated to this invoice

Name: Latest contact last name
Description: The latest last name value among contacts associated to this invoice

Name: Invoice link
Description: The invoice url link, based on the domain and slug.

Name: Invoice source
Description: Creation source of the Invoice.
Options: HubSpot (native_invoice); Data Sync (data_sync); Legacy QuickBooks Online (legacy_quickbooks_online); Legacy Xero (legacy_xero)
Usages: Sales view (2); Data sync filter property (1)

Name: Invoice status
Description: The status of the Invoice. Invoice statuses allow you to categorize and track billing progress.
Usages: Automation platform flow (1); Report (7); Data sync mapping (1); Sales view (2); Pipeline object tag (1); Data sync filter property (1)

Name: Invoice status details
Description: Additional invoice status details.
Options: Partially Paid (partially_paid); Partially Refunded (partially_refunded); Refunded (refunded); Payment Processing (payment_processing)

Name: Invoice Tool Source
Description: The tool that was used to create the invoice.
Options: Invoice Editor (invoice_editor); Payment Link (payment_link); Quote (quote); Subscription (subscription)

Name: Invoice Tool Source ID
Description: The ID of the tool used to create the invoice.

Name: Language
Description: Language of the Invoice.

Name: Last reminder sent date
Description: The last time an email reminder was sent to the customer. This is automatically updated by HubSpot.

Name: Last sent date
Description: The last time the invoice was sent to the customer. This is updated automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Locale
Description: Locale of the Invoice.

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: net payment term
Description: Refers to the period, expressed in days (e.g., Net 30), within which invoice must be paid

Name: Number
Description: The 3rd party number associated to this invoice

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Payment date
Description: The date when payment of an invoice has fully completed.
Usages: Report (1); Sales view (2); Data sync filter property (1)

Name: PDF download link
Description: The link to download the pdf of this Invoice.

Name: PO number
Description: Purchase order number of the invoice

Name: Received by recipient date (QuickBooks Online)
Description: The date the invoice was received by the recipient.

Name: Recipient company street address
Description: The address of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient company street address 2
Description: Additional address of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient company city
Description: The city of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient company country
Description: The country of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient company state/region
Description: The state or region of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient company postal code
Description: The postal or zip code of the recipient's company or organization.

Name: Recipient shipping street address
Description: The shipping address of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping street address 2
Description: Additional shipping address of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping city
Description: The shipping city of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping country
Description: The shipping country of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping name
Description: The shipping name of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping state/region
Description: The shipping state or region of the recipient.

Name: Recipient shipping postal code
Description: The shipping postal or zip code of the recipient.

Name: External Invoice Status
Description: The external status of the current invoice. This value is retrieved from a third party and may not be modified
Options: Waiting to be sent (INVOICE_WAITING_TO_BE_SENT); Sent to customer (INVOICE_SENT); Partial payment made (INVOICE_PAYMENT_MADE); Fully paid (INVOICE_FULLY_PAID); Overdue (INVOICE_OVERDUE); Voided (INVOICE_VOIDED)

Name: Store payment method at checkout
Description: Allow customers to store their payment method at checkout.

Name: Subtotal
Description: The sum of all line items of the invoice including line item level taxes.

Name: Tax ID
Description: The account tax ID listed on this invoice. The tax ID includes a tax ID type and a tax ID number.

Name: Taxes total
Description: The sum of all taxes applied to the invoice.

Name: Time zone
Description: The time zone of dates on the invoice.

Name: Title
Description: Title of the Invoice.

Name: Owner assigned date
Description: The most recent timestamp of when an owner was assigned to this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner
Description: The owner of the object.

Name: Owner's main team
Description: The main team of the record owner. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Payment Token
Description: The token abbreviation e.g USDC

Name: Transaction Hash Link
Description: Link to the transaction in a block explorer like Etherscan or Arbiscan.

Name: Unit Price of Token at Transaction Time
Description: The calculated unit price of a non-standard token (anything other than USDC) at the time of the transaction.
